Package Classes.Listing.Item

Class ItemMeasurement

java.lang.Object
Classes.Listing.Item.ItemMeasurement
public class ItemMeasurement
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a measurement of an item. The area that is to be measured is provided by the template loaded from the CategoryDataService and is identifiable by the ID provided in the template.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    long categoryMeasurementId
    The ID of the measurement field (IE, chest, length, etc), provided by the template.
    java.lang.Long itemMeasurementId
    The ID of the measurement.
    double itemMeasurementValue
    The value of the measurement as provided by the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ItemMeasurement​(long categoryMeasurementId, long itemMeasurementId, double itemMeasurementValue)
    Constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • categoryMeasurementId

      public long categoryMeasurementId
      The ID of the measurement field (IE, chest, length, etc), provided by the template.
      Set By:
      The Android app when the user sets a value for a measurement. Assigned to correspond to the ID provided by the template.
      Set When:
      Saving a new item
      Can Be Modified By:
      No one.
      Can Be Modified When:
      Never.

    • itemMeasurementId

      public java.lang.Long itemMeasurementId
      The ID of the measurement. Set by the database and used to relate the measurement to the Item.

      NOTE: This will be NULL when creating a new item in the app. It is not set until the item is saved.

      Set By:
      The database (should be autoincremented)
      Set When:
      Saving a new item
      Can Be Modified By:
      No one
      Can Be Modified When:
      Never

    • itemMeasurementValue

      public double itemMeasurementValue
      The value of the measurement as provided by the user. Assumed to be inches.
      Set By:
      The user
      Set When:
      Creating an item in the app
      Can Be Modified By:
      The user
      Can Be Modified When:
      Editing an existing item in the app

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemMeasurement

      public ItemMeasurement​(long categoryMeasurementId, long itemMeasurementId, double itemMeasurementValue)
      Constructor. All three fields are required.
